title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 291 - Withholding Of Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 291 - Withholding Of Tax

State Regulations
§ 291.1 - Determining New York City personal income tax on residents to be withheld
§ 291.2 - Employer's returns and payment of withheld taxes

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 291

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 671[a], 697[a], 1304-B, 1309, 1312[a];Administrative Code of the City of New York, §§
11-1771[a], 11-1797, 11-1909, 11-1943

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
